docs.snippet: Football players at big schools could make several hundred thousand dollars in their college careers if they were paid a portion of the broadcast rights to games similar to what NFL players now get, under a model suggested by a sports economist....
docs.lead_paragraph: Football players at big schools could make several hundred thousand dollars in their college careers if they were paid a portion of the broadcast rights to games similar to what NFL players now get, under a model suggested by a sports economist.

headline.main: Players Could Make Big Money Under Plan

docs.snippet: From the stadium in Sao Paulo to sofas in Germany, from a pub in Nairobi to a cafe in Miami, from a Rio slum to outer space, nearly half the world's population was expected to tune in to the World Cup, soccer's premier event which kicked off Thurs...
docs.lead_paragraph: From the stadium in Sao Paulo to sofas in Germany, from a pub in Nairobi to a cafe in Miami, from a Rio slum to outer space, nearly half the world's population was expected to tune in to the World Cup, soccer's premier event which kicked off Thursday in Brazil.

headline.main: From Slums to Space, World Tunes In to World Cup
headline.print_headline: From Slums to Space, World Tunes In to World Cup

docs.snippet: Gyula Grosics, goalkeeper for the 'Magical Magyars' Hungarian football team that were virtually unbeatable in the early 1950s, died on Friday, his family told the national news agency MTI. He was 88....
